reuters.title: WASHINGTON POST CO 3RD QTR SHR 4.77 DLRS VS 1.65 DLRS
reuters.body: Whirlpool Corp said it is having joint venture discussions with <Vitro S.A.> of Monterrey, Nuevo Leon, Mexico, on the formation of a Mexican venture for the manufacture and sale of major home appliances. It said Vitro has consolidated sales projected at 1.0 billion dlrs (U.S.) for 1987. Reuter 
